title: My google pixel 4xl's face recognition is not working at all. It always says can't verify face.
content: I have tried resetting my face ID several time. I have tried setting my face ID under different lights too. Have switched on and off my device before setting a new face ID. Updated my phone too and still my face unlock feature fails to work. It always says "can't verify face" while my screen is unlocked and I try to open it with my face ID.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
